original_title: O Risco: Lúcio Costa e a Utopia Moderna
overview: Lucio Costa is one of the rare personalities in the history of Brazil who allows him to cross his individual history with nation-building in a very natural and open way. The documentary narrates, through the trajectory of the architect and urban planner Lucio Costa, the process of "formation" of modern Brazilian architecture.
title: O Risco: Lúcio Costa e a Utopia Moderna
